name: 藝術與視覺文化研究方法
description: 透過文獻的閱讀、分析及討論，了解藝術史學方法、視覺藝術研究方法
goals: 透過文獻的閱讀學習資料蒐集分析的研究方法
了解藝術史論及視覺藝術研究的步驟
透過學習研究法尋找自我研究的方向及目標
syllabus:
1\. Carrier, David. "Art History." Critical Terms for Art History. Eds. Robert S. Nelson and Richard Shiff. Chicago and London: U. of Chicago Press, 1992.  pp.129-141.

  Greenhalgh, Michael and Paul Duro.  “Introduction.” Essential Art History.        London: Bloomsbury, 1992. Pp. 1-13. (+ “The Literature of the Discipline”pp.15-21.)

    藝術史學科的本質與範疇

2\. Roskill, Mark. The Interpretation of Pictures. U. of Massachusetts Press, 1989. pp.36-61. (ch2. "The study of imagery and creative processes")

    藝術的圖像與創作過程

3\. Kultermann, Udo. he History of Art History.  Anthony S. Kaufmann Publication, 1993. pp.11-20.  (I. "Artists' Histories". on Vasari) 瓦薩里藝術史概述與批評

  Vasari, Georgio. The Lives of the Artists. (1998) rept. trans. Julia C. Bondanella and Peter Bondanella. Oxford U. Press, 2008. pp. vii-xiv. ("introduction"); pp. 3-6. ("preface to _Lives_"). 瓦薩里藝術史觀

4.Winckelmann, Johan Joachim. "Reflections on the Imitation of Greek Works in Painting and Sculpture." The Art of Art History: a critical anthology. Ed. Donald Preziosi, Oxford University Press, 1998. Pp. 31-39. (ch.1. "Art as History")

    溫克爾曼和瓦薩里藝術史觀與方法的比較

5\. Carrier, David. " Deep Innovation and Mere Eccentricity: Six case studies of innovation in art history." Art History and Its Institutions: Foundation of a Discipline.  Ed. Elizabeth Mansfield.  London: Routledge, 2002. pp.115-131.

    介紹幾個藝術史研究的例子

6\. Reading week

7\. Preziosi, Donald. ed. The Art of Art History: a critical anthology. Pp. 109-142.

      (Ch.3 Style: "Introduction." pp. 109-114.  Heinrich Wolfflin, “Principles of Art history.” pp115-126;  David Summers, ‘form’,  "nineteenth-century metaphysics, and the problem of art historical description"  pp.127-142)

   Iversen, Margaret and Stephen Melville. Writing Art History: Disciplinary Departures. U. of Chicago Press, 2010. PP. 60-89. (Ch4. "What the Formalist Knows")

    藝術史風格研究法：沃夫林、薩莫斯、

8\. Preziosi, Donald. ed.  The Art of Art History: a critical anthology. Pp. 143-163. (Style; Meyer Schapiro, style; Ernst Gombrich, Style)

9\. Reading week期中考

10\. Donald Preziosi, Ed. The Art of Art History: a critical anthology. Oxford University Press, 1998. Pp. 227-263. (ch.5 "Mechanisms of Meaning: Iconography and Semiology";  "Introduction", 227-233. Hubert Damish, "Semiotics and Iconography" 234-. 藝術史研究的圖像意涵和符號學研究

11\. Preziosi, Donald. Rethinking Art History: meditation on a coy science. Yale U. P., 1989. pp. 1-20. (“A crisis in, or of, art history,” ) pp. 1-20;

   傳統藝術史研究所遭遇來自其他學科領域涉入藝術史研究的挑戰

12\. Dikovitskaya, Margaret. Visual Culture: The Study of the Visual after the Cultural Turn. Cambridge, Massachusetts: MIT Press, 2006. pp. 3-45. "Introduction"; pp.64-84 "Between Art History and Cultural Studies: Methodology of Visual Studies"
